segments.text: Now we have settled the terms of payment . Is it possible to effect shipment during September ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then when is the earliest we can expect shipment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: By the middle of October , I think .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's too late . You see , November is the season for this commodity in our market , and our Customs formalities are rather complicated .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Besides , the flow through the marketing channels and the red tape involved take at least a couple of weeks . Thus , after shipment it will be four to five weeks altogether before the goods can reach our retailers . The goods must therefore be shipped before October ; otherwise we won't be in time for the selling season .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But our factories are fully committed for the third quarter . In fact , many of our clients are placing orders for delivery in the fourth quarter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mr . Brown , you certainly realize that the time of delivery is a matter of great importance to us . If we place our goods on the market at a time when all other importers have already sold their goods at profitable prices , we shall lose out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see your point . However , we have done more business this year than any of the previous years . I am very sorry to say that we cannot advance the time of delivery .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's too bad , but I sincerely hope you will give our request your special consideration .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You may take it from me that the last thing we want to do is to disappoint an old customer like you . But the fact remains that our manufacturers have a heavy backlog on their hands .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But can't you find some way to get round your producers for an earlier delivery ? Make a special effort , please . A timely delivery means a lot to us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . We'll get in touch with our producers and see what they have to say .
segments.speaker: S2
